channel.title: Premium SMF themes
channel.description:
I know they have been released a few times. This includes expo etc.
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?8nil9a1a93f6aww]Premium smf themes[/url]
PSD files are included
I take no credit for the files found it on google and was very helpful so sharing. ( I went through like ten pages looking for a couple of these but this one site had them )

item.title: Premium SMF themes
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:11, topic:442266”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=544906.msg3994569#msg3994569 date=1337098111]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=544906.msg3994554#msg3994554 date=1337095273]
If it’s a theme, there should be pictures
[/quote]http://demo.dzinerstudio.com/

compare the theme name to the demo name and you can view like that
[/quote]Nice, now list the names of the themes in the OP :D[/quote]won’t be on computer for a couple of days but ill get around to it eventually.

Read full topic

item.title: Premium SMF themes
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:15, topic:442266”][quote author=Ruby Forums Coder link=topic=544906.msg3994679#msg3994679 date=1337114346]

Smf looks nice but is it hard to setup and maintain? Never used, always used phpbb etc.

SMF is simple to setup and maintain. It’s all handed to you on a plate, it’s the same with every well known forums board, they’re simple to set up, fair enough, ipboards and vbulletins are a little harder to maintain and edit, but it isn’t rocket science.
[/quote]
Ah cheers.[/quote]
No problemo.

Read full topic

item.title: Premium SMF themes
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“WWW.ZEPSITY.CO.UK, post:2, topic:442282”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=544906.msg3994495#msg3994495 date=1337086210]

i wouldnt release if you found on google.

you even tested for virus’s? and you have 0 pics.
[/quote]honestly, I have NOT however I do use like three of these on several forums and I have had no disruptive malware etc installed. I have never had the actual need to cause I use a virtual session.

IF there is a virus in one of them please supply valid proof and I will remove the malware and re-release.

I didnt want it to sound like i was being a douche sorry bro[/quote]
Multiple accounts >.>. Gtfo this forum and spam a different one.

Read full topic
